name: MarcXimiL
short_description: MarcXimiL is a flexible multi-platform bibliographic similarity analysis framework. Features: deduplication, information monitoring, visual analysis, plagiarism detection. Supported: MARCXML, OAI-PMH2 harvesting, and importation of text MARC.
